properties.displayName: Deny creation of VNets that don't follow a pre-defined naming convention
properties.description: This Policy will deny the creation of VNets that do not follow a pre-defined naming convention.

meatdata.description: The policy will concat this value with the provisioned resources location. Example, if you provide the value of '-example' the concat result will be like: 'eastus-example'. If the created resources name does not match this contact then Policy will deny the creation.

metadata.description: Deny, Audit or Disabled the execution of the Policy
